name: boost-moldova
title: Moldova BOOST Government Expenditure Database (sample)

fields.name: admin2
fields.description: Administrative Classification Variables: Level 2: Public Authority

fields.name: admin3
fields.description: Administrative Classification Variables: Level 3 (Central): Central Government Institution

fields.name: admin5
fields.description: Administrative Classification Variables: Level 4 (Local): Local Government Institution

fields.name: func1
fields.description: Functional Classification Variables: Level 1: Main Group

fields.name: econ2
fields.description: Economic Classification Variables: Level 2: Line Item

fields.name: fin_source
fields.description: Other Classification Variables: Source of Financing: Budget Component

description: The Moldova BOOST government expenditure database was constructed the basis of treasury data provided to the World Bank by  under the auspices of the Moldovan Ministry of Finance (MoF).  Moldova BOOST dataset presents initial, revised and executed  dissected in two levels of economic classification (articles and  items), two levels of functional classification, source of financing and administrative classifications broken down at central government (ministries, departments and individual spending units) and local level (districts, mayoralties and schools).
